name: Ruth H. STALLING, Appellant, v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION SECURITY FUND and Inservco Insurance Services, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Stalling v. Workers' Compensation Security Fund & Inservco Insurance Services Inc.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: Ruth H. STALLING, Appellant, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION SECURITY FUND and Inservco Insurance Services, Inc.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David S. Dessen, Sharon L. Steingard, Philadelphia, for appellant.
David L. Bricker, Harrisburg, for Workmen’s Comp. Sec. Fund.
Karen M. Balaban, Harrisburg, for Inservco Ins. Services, Inc.
casebody.head_matter:
640 A.2d 409
Ruth H. STALLING, Appellant, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION SECURITY FUND and Inservco Insurance Services, Inc.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 7, 1994.
Decided April 22, 1994.
David S. Dessen, Sharon L. Steingard, Philadelphia, for appellant.
David L. Bricker, Harrisburg, for Workmen’s Comp. Sec. Fund.
Karen M. Balaban, Harrisburg, for Inservco Ins. Services, Inc.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
